Title: Probability I
Topics: Course Introduction; Probability Measures;  Random Variables (RVs); PDFs, PMFs, & CDFs

Title: Probabilty II
Topics: Expectation & Transformation; Random Vectors; Joint and conditional distributions; Independence

Title: Conditional Expectation & Inequalities
Topics: Covariance & Correlation; Conditional expectation; Concentration inequalities; Expectation Inequalities

Title: Limit Theorems
Topics: Statistical Models and Inference; Parametric and nonparmetric models; Goals of inference; Inferential frameworks

Title: Likelihoood I
Topics: Likelihood function; Likelihood principle; Asymptotic theory

Title: Likelihood II
Topics: Misspecified Models; Numerical computation of MLEs
